videos.title: MOST INSANE Gravel COURSE EVER?!? (Rock Cobbler Gravel Race Breakdown)
videos.description:
Is this the best gravel racing course ever made? I absolutely think so. And in this cycling video I breakdown my gravel race of the rock cobbler 2023. I show you from a POV view point the entire race course and my commentary on how it went down.

Gravel racing in America has exploded in popularity and so many new events are popping up every year. This is the 10th running of the rock cobbler in Bakersfield California. And in my opinion, this is hands-down, the absolute best event in California if not the entire country.

This course was so dynamic and had something for everyone. Regardless of your skill set, fitness, or bike choice, this course in Bakersfield had something for you.

#Cycling #MountainBiking #GravelRacing #BikeRacing #GravelBike

videos.title: Rock Cobbler 13.0: Unlucky Number Edition
videos.description:
Gravel Bike California has been fearful of Rock Cobbler 13.0 for years, but survived to tell the tale of gravel cycling's most unique event.

Gravel Bike California Shops:
https://gravelbikecalifornia.threadless.com/

Support Gravel Bike California on Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/gravelbikecalifornia

Sign up for our Newsletter:
https://gravelbikecalifornia.com/newsletter/

Route:
hhttps://ridewithgps.com/routes/53879198

Find more routes on our map of Gravel Guides across California:
https://gravelbikecalifornia.com/california-gravel-guides/

Follow us on:
https://www.instagram.com/gravelbikecalifornia
https://www.facebook.com/groups/gravelbikecalifornia
https://www.strava.com/clubs/gravelbikecalifornia

0:00 - 2:41 Intro
2:41 - 4:54 Hart Park Warmup
4:54 - 8:24 Northern Ranchlands
8:24 - 11:19 Round Mountain
11:19 - 16:42 Breckenridge
16:42 - 20:39 Out of the Hills
20:39 - 25:36 Home Stretch Hike-a-Bike

videos.title: Bull strikes 4 bicyclists during Rock Cobbler Race near Bakersfield
videos.description: Videos have surfaced from the Rock Cobbler Race in Bakersfield showing a bull attacking cyclists during the race on Saturday. Organizers say the bicyclists will be okay.

videos.title: How I Got My BEST EVER Gravel Race FINISH! (Rock Cobbler 2024)
videos.description:
In this gravel cycling video, I walked through my experience and my race at the 11th edition of the rock cobbler in Bakersfield, California. This turned out to be my best ever finish at a proper gravel race, which is strange, because I went into it with zero expectations and just wanted to tell a good story of the course. 

The rock cobbler is one of the most dynamic courses on the gravel cycling circuit. With steep and technical downhill, pitch steep, pitches to climb, and wild cattle to gallop with. I raced the boulder route, which is the newest and longest version of the rock cobbler. Only 50 spots were available, so it wasn’t a super stacked field, although there were racers like Peter Stettner and Tobin, who are certified hitters in the gravel cycling race scene

STRAVA : https://www.strava.com/activities/10737176358/overview 

SUPPORT: https://www.RideBikes.com

videos.title: Rock Cobbler 12.0(4K)
videos.description:
Gravel Bike California digs in to celebrate gravel's dirty dozen with Rock Cobbler 12.0 our favorite one yet: https://gravelbikecalifornia.com/rock-cobbler-12-0/

Gravel Bike California Shops:
https://gravelbikecalifornia.threadless.com/
https://jakroo.com/store-front?storeId=H1YvvCf9A

Support Gravel Bike California on Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/gravelbikecalifornia

Sign up for our Newsletter:
https://gravelbikecalifornia.com/newsletter/

Route:
https://ridewithgps.com/routes/49635653

Find more routes on our map of Gravel Guides across California:
https://gravelbikecalifornia.com/california-gravel-guides/

Follow us on:
https://www.instagram.com/gravelbikecalifornia
https://www.facebook.com/groups/gravelbikecalifornia
https://www.strava.com/clubs/gravelbikecalifornia

0:00 - 2:21 Intro
2:21 - 4:49 Rollers Warmup
4:49 - 9:31 Breckenridge
9:31 - 13:18 Rancheria to Round Mt
13:18 - 18:19 Northern Ranchlands
18:19 - 22:46 Pleasure & Pain
